page.title: 19People in Stanwell cont.
page.content:
{A Day in the Life of Mrs Hennah}
Mrs Hennah is one of our teachers. She went to school in Stanwell but lives in Ashford now. She went to the Girls School but that is flats now.
She gets up at 7 o'clock and gets breakfast for her three sons and her husband. Then she makes the sandwiches for her husband to take to work. Then she goes to work herself. She teaches in our nursery class. She tells stories and plays the piano for singing.
When she gets home, sometimes one of her sons make a cup of tea for her before she cooks the dinner. When her sons are asleep she likes to read. Kavisha Adapen Aged 7yrs
